body.name: MOUNTUP Universal Speaker Stands Pair for Surround Sound, 31" Height Floor Speaker Stand, Holds Bookshelf Speaker Satellite Speaker Large Speakers, Up to 22LBS Cable Concealing 9.8" Plate Black MU9132
features: 【FOR SURROUND SOUNDS】Elevate your audio experience with our 31-inch height speaker stand pair. They are designed to deliver the most enjoyable 3D stereo surround sound. It's at a perfect height for home or commercial use. With our stand, you could get your speakers up closer to ear level for better surround sound. And free it from a table or desk, better utilizing the space in your room.

【 WIDE COMPATIBILITY】 With the 9.8"x9.8" large square top plate, MOUNTUP rear surround sound speaker stand is universal for most satellite and bookshelf speakers. It's compatible with Sonos, Klipsch, Samsung, Sony, Bose, Yamaha, Edifier, Vizio, Polk, and more. Package also includes 4 pieces of anti-slip pads to keep speaker from falling off, you could place it according to the size of your speakers.

【STURDY AND STABLE】This pair of speaker stand is made of durable heavy-duty alloy steel with a sturdy 11.8" tempered glass base. It has passed our strength and safety test to ensure the security of your speaker before launch. It could hold up to 22lbs each with ease. We provide rubber foot pads for tile/wood floors and metal nails for carpets to adapt to all scenes with stability.
【CABLE CONCEALING】Run the speaker cables through the hollowed hole of the speaker stands' poles. Concealing the speaker cables for a more neat and tidy look.

【EASY ASSEMBLY】 – Installation could be done with just an Allen Key in 10 minutes. The package includes all the hardware you need. The space-saving dimensions of the speaker stands pair are 11.8” (W) x 11.8” (D) x 31” (H).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More Stability Than Expected
reviews.reviewText: I was looking to enhance the acoustics of my speakers, and I'm pleased that I came across these stands. The quality build of the parts ensures sturdiness once assembled. The sleek design and point feet are ideal for my carpet, providing more stability than expected. These stands excel in several aspect - the height elevates the speakers to ear level, there's effective cable management to conceal wires, and assembly is straightforward. Visually, they look fantastic, and structurally, they are solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Really good speaker stand for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: Was rather surprised at the quality of these as I was putting them together. The glass base is a nice looking piano black touch that adds the weight down low required to be stable. The adjustable feet or spikes if you use them on carpet makes it a piece of cake to level and make stable, even if your floor isn't perfectly flat and a little wavey like most floors are. I would recommend these if the height works with your needs since these are fixed, not adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty heavy set of speaker stands, do not have a large footprint like others
reviews.reviewText: The speaker stands require assembly, and there are a number of parts, but they are not difficult to put together. They have a decent weight and a small footprint, which the latter is very helpful in a tight space. It will also allow me to free up room on my end tables where my speakers were sitting previously. They provided two options for the feet - pointed for carpet, and flat ones for hard flooring. The last pair of speaker stands I bought did not have feet for hard flooring, which required me to figure out a workaround (buying additional items). I love that it allows you to hide the cables into the tubes of the stand. The plate for the speakers also has pads to help keep your speaker in place, which is very important, especially with hardwood floors and vibrations. Overall, I would definitely recommend these, but be sure they are the right size for your speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very excited to finally get my speakers off the floor and have a proper vinyl setup. These are just the perfect height and sit at the midline of my TV. It was easy to assemble and doesn't require too much work. The instructions are in English and easy to understand. I can't imagine these being too easy for the cats to topple over, but the rubber feet for the top help keep the speakers in place so they don't slip. I like how the wire can be hidden inside the stand and out of sight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working great for Edifier speakers
reviews.reviewText: I am running out of room on my actual desk so I decided to try and move the speakers off of the desk and onto stands on the side. These speaker stands were very easy to assemble and only took a few minutes to get together. Once assembled, the stands are rock solid and quite heavy. After getting everything setup just the way I wanted I was surprised at how well they worked. They do a great job of keeping the speakers in place and there have been no problems at all so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Listening Experience
reviews.reviewText: These MountUp universal speaker stands arrived in a form-fitting box. The components within the box were all wrapped in plastic and bubble wrap. An instruction sheet was also included. The instructions were clear and the stands were easy to put together.The stands surprised me. I didn't expect them to be as nice as they are. They're stable, solid and well-constructed. The base is glass. They're attractive stands and add to the surroundings (as opposed to those that are more utilitarian and you'd want to hide). At 31" high, when speakers are placed on them, it's a nice height for anyone - and just the right height for those in a sitting position (the tweeters more or less being at ear level).All in all, I'm happy with these stands. Should my experience with them change in the future, I'll update the review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These arrived and the box had a decent weight to it.The box had some separation but none of the contents was lost.It was a box in a slighly larger box that had the address on it.I suggest they be packed differently.As for the product.There is some simple assembly required but when these are assembled they’re exactly what I needed.These are nice.I will be purchasing a second set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heavyweight stands
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly for this pair of speaker stands. The bottom has adjustable foot pegs that allow you to adjust them if you have hardwood or vinyl flooring. Very versatile with pointed pegs for carpeted flooring. Very heavy and seemed to be very balanced. Good purchase overall and very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy Stand - Perfect for My Edifier R1280DB Speakers
reviews.reviewText: These speaker stands have been perfect for positioning my Edifier R1280DB bookshelf speakers to a better listening height. I used to have the speakers placed on a low TV table which was slightly less than knee height when sitting, but after I wall mounted my TV higher up, I had been looking for a way to improve my setup so I am glad that I found this product.Assembly was straightforward and easy. The build quality seems sturdy and durable. Sometimes furniture you get on Amazon tends to have bad uniformity when it comes to paint, but the black coating of these stands were nice and uniform. Being able to channel cables through the shaft was a good addition and let me achieve a clean look and helps prevent accidental cable yanking when cleaning especially when vacuuming.I appreciate that it comes with two different kinds of foot pads for wood floors or carpets since I do plan on eventually ripping out my living room's old carpeting and replacing it with wooden flooring. The product also conveniently comes with anti-slip pads for placing on the stand tops.

I am extremely pleased with the Universal Speaker Stands Pair for Surround Sound. The assembly process was a breeze, taking only a few minutes of my time. Once set up, the stands are impressively sturdy and offer excellent stability for my bookshelf speakers. Additionally, their substantial weight ensures minimal vibrations and enhances the overall audio experience.

These speaker display stands require assembling, all tools are parts were provided.The assembling process is quick and easy. The instructions are clear and easy to follow along and it does not take a very long time to assemble both stands.The quality of the stands are very nice . Good solid material used to build them and they’re very stable once assembled. The base feels like a thick glass while the top of the stand feels like thick wood both nicely finished in black.What’s really nice about these stands is that the speaker cords can be fed through the poles for a neat and clean look.They came with two types of feet, one for carpeted flooring and the other for bare floors such as wood.These stands display my speakers in such a modern and chic way.I did have a issue with one of them and it appears that one of the screws when tightened slightly pushed up the top of one of the stands.Apart from that I’m very pleased with them.
